trans-unit.source: Represents a thumbnail image of a document sequence, single document, or single page.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma imagem em miniatura de uma sequência de documento, um único documento ou uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The XpsThumbnail class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: A classe XpsThumbnail não tem nenhum construtor público.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an XpsThumbnail is provided through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um XpsThumbnail é fornecida por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that if any page in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> has a thumbnail, that all pages be specified with thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável que se qualquer página em um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>tem uma miniatura, que todas as páginas de ser especificado com miniaturas.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>
